name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi.
description: With a view to provide income support to all land holding eligible farmer families, the Government has launched PM-KISAN
eligibility: The Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi 2023 is open to all small and marginal farmers who own less than 2 hectares (4.9 acres) of land. To be eligible, farmers must have a valid Aadhaar number and bank account. They must also self-declare that they do not own more than 2 hectares of land.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: A scheme aimed at promoting holistic development of agriculture by encouraging farmers to adopt innovative and modern farming practices.
eligibility: All farmers across the country are eligible. The scheme focuses on enhancing the productivity and income of farmers through various interventions.

name: Kisan Credit Card Yojana
description: A financial inclusion scheme providing farmers with credit facilities to meet their agricultural expenses and improve their financial well-being.
eligibility: Farmers with a landholding and a valid Aadhaar number can apply. The scheme offers flexible and affordable credit to meet farming needs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: A crop insurance scheme designed to mitigate the financial risks faced by farmers due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops are eligible. The scheme provides comprehensive coverage against yield and revenue losses.

name: Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan
description: A scheme promoting the use of solar energy in agriculture to enhance irrigation facilities and reduce farmers' dependence on traditional power sources.
eligibility: Farmers interested in adopting solar-powered irrigation systems are eligible. The scheme encourages sustainable energy practices.

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture
description: A mission to promote sustainable agriculture practices and ensure the efficient use of resources for the long-term benefit of farmers and the environment.
eligibility: Farmers adopting sustainable farming practices are eligible. The mission focuses on soil health, water use efficiency, and crop diversification.

name: Mukhyamantri Kisan Sathi Yojana
description: A state-specific scheme aimed at providing comprehensive support to farmers in terms of financial assistance, training, and access to modern farming techniques.
eligibility: Farmers in the specific state are eligible. The scheme aims to uplift the agricultural community through various initiatives.

name: Gramin Bhandaran Yojana
description: A scheme focused on creating modern storage infrastructure in rural areas to reduce post-harvest losses and improve farmers' income.
eligibility: Farmers and cooperatives in rural areas are eligible. The scheme promotes the construction of godowns and cold storage facilities.

name: Kisan Samman Nidhi - Organic Farming
description: An extension of the PM-KISAN scheme, focusing on providing financial support to farmers practicing organic farming methods.
eligibility: Farmers engaged in organic farming practices are eligible. The scheme aims to promote environmentally friendly agricultural practices.

name: Krishi Aadarsh Gram Yojana
description: A scheme focused on transforming selected villages into model agricultural communities by providing comprehensive support and infrastructure.
eligibility: Villages meeting specified criteria are eligible. The scheme aims to showcase and replicate successful agricultural models.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: A scheme promoting organic farming in clusters to improve soil health, reduce the use of chemical inputs, and enhance farmers' income.
eligibility: Farmers practicing organic farming in clusters are eligible. The scheme encourages the adoption of traditional and organic farming methods.
